Name: Wordle
About the game: This game can be safely called a family game, because playing Wordle you can have fun in a family circle. The principle of the puzzle is as follows: the screen contains letters, from which you need to make words on a specially designated field. The word game is an entertaining and at the same time complex process. Each Wordle level is more difficult than the previous one: each subsequent puzzle contains an increasing number of letters each time. The word game in Wordle can't bore you quickly,because it contains 10 thematic categories: Animals,Beach,Outdoor recreation,Computers,Monsters,Art,Science,Meal,Family,Sport. The game has a variety of exercises on any topic and any complexity. In case the puzzle seems too difficult, you can use the hints. Add letters, find words, complete levels, work your head and develop your intelligence in an exciting, family-friendly game Wordle. Have a good game!
